SKT_FIRST.name: Reign of Terror
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。このスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고, <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,有<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>的几率使<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n该技能根据生命值上限而非攻击力等比提升\n伤害。

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 防御力DOWN強化\n(効果抵抗無視)
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 强化防御力降低\n(无视效果抵抗)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nReduces Eternal Enlightenment cooldown by 2 turns
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【究竟涅槃三世妖狐】の\nスキルターン-2ターン
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n究竟涅槃三世妖狐冷却时间-2回合

SKT_SECOND.name: Nirvana's Inferno
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Active Effect) When an ally is hit, counterattacks with <color=#28d9ed>Nirvana's Inferno</color>.\nBefore attacking, removes <color=#28d9ed>2</color> <color=#28d9ed>Buffs</color> from the target and decreases <color=#28d9ed>Effect Resistance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. If the target is <color=#28d9ed>Earth Element</color>, ignores Effect Resistance and does not miss.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果) 味方が被弾時、<color=#28d9ed>彼岸劫火</color>で反撃する。\n攻撃前、対象の強化効果を<color=#28d9ed>2つ</color>解除し、<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>効果抵抗</color>をDOWNさせる。対象が<color=#28d9ed>地属性</color>の場合、対象の効果抵抗を無視し、ミスが発生しない。\nこのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 아군이 피격 시 <color=#28d9ed>피안의 겁화</color>로 반격합니다.\n공격 전 대상의 강화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>2개</color> 해제하고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>효과 저항</color>을 감소시킵니다. 대상이 <color=#28d9ed>지속성</color>이라면 대상의 효과 저항을 무시하고, 빗나감이 발생하지 않습니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (发动效果) 我方受到攻击时,使用<color=#28d9ed>彼岸的火劫</color>进行反击。\n攻击前解除目标<color=#28d9ed>2个</color>强化效果,并使<color=#28d9ed>效果抵抗</color>降低,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。若目标为<color=#28d9ed>地属性</color>,无视目标的效果抵抗,且不会发生闪避。\n该技能伤害根据生命值上限而非攻击力等比提升。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Eternal Enlightenment
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and recovers Chain Points by <color=#28d9ed>10</color>. Increases the <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of boss monsters by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to Max Health instead of Attack and ignores the target's Resilience.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、CPを<color=#28d9ed>10</color>獲得させる。ボスの<color=#28d9ed>スキルターン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>増加させる。\nこのスキルは攻撃力の代わりに最大HPが高いほどダメージがUPし、対象の効果抵抗を無視する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다. 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 부여하고, CP를 <color=#28d9ed>10</color> 회복합니다. 보스에게는 <color=#28d9ed>스킬 쿨타임</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 공격력 대신 최대 체력에 비례하여 피해가 증가하고, 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人。使全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>持续恢复</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,并恢复<color=#28d9ed>10</color>的CP。使首领的<color=#28d9ed>技能冷却时间</color>增加<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。\n该技能根据生命值上限而非攻击力等比提升伤害,并无视目标的效果抵抗。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Damage dealt by Skill Chain attacks of the caster increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack, and when attacking, deals <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage to the target.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt increases proportional to <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color> instead of Attack.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:自分のチェーンスキルが攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPし、攻撃時、対象に対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃力の代わりに<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 자신의 스킬 체인 공격이 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가하며, 공격 시 대상에게 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> 만큼의 고정 피해를 입힙니다. \n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격력 대신 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携起始效果</color>:自身的连携技能攻击根据<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害,且攻击时,对目标造成相当于目标生命值上限<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>的固定伤害。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:根据<color=#28d9ed>生命值上限</color>而非攻击力等比提升伤害。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
